content:
Using a combination of your coupon binder and a spreadsheet will give you the best of both worlds.

And congratulations on remembering to log your savings from the H&M coupon! $15 is a great start to your savings journey!

Be sure to update your coupon binder and spreadsheet with the details of your savings:

* In your coupon binder, add a note or entry with the date, store, item(s) purchased, original price, coupon/discount amount, and total savings.
* In your spreadsheet, add a new row with the same information, and calculate the total savings column to reflect the $15 you saved.

As you continue to use coupons and track your savings, you'll be able to see your progress and stay motivated to find more ways to save.

Remember to regularly review your coupon binder and spreadsheet to:

* Ensure you're staying organized and on top of your coupons and savings
* Identify areas where you can improve your couponing strategy
* Celebrate your successes and reflect on what's working well for you

Keep up the great work, and happy couponing!
